Title: Establishes a New York native plants designation within the New York state grown and certified program
Summary: Directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets, acting by and through the department of economic development, in cooperation with the department of environmental conservation, to establish a New York native plants designation within the New York state grown and certified program, for certain native plants grown, cultivated, harvested, or distributed by nurseries, plant farms, garden centers, and other horticultural vendors in the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง16, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing a New York native plants designation within the New York state grown and certified program
